10 - continue working in stockinette b o dy to close the bottom of the pockets the lining and pocket sts are joined together put the lining sts of each pocket on a dpn and the body & pocket sts back on your working needles round 71 rs k the first 3 sts on your working needle body & pocket sts then align the dpn with the left pocket lining sts and your left working needle insert your right needle through the first st on both needles and knit resulting in knitting them together 3-needle join4 repeat for all remaining sts on the dpn then k till you got 41 44 47 sts left on your working needle align the dpn with the right pocket lining sts and use the 3-needle join4 to close the bottom of the right pocket k the 3 remaining sts on your working needle continue working in stockinette round 77 rs bobble using the top variation of the regular bobble alternate between knitting and purling your stitches as you bind off or a method of your choice sleeves round 1 and 2 use the technique described in the video to avoid underarm holes5 place a marker to mark the beginning of the row then pick up 2 bars + 6 sts of the underarm cast on + 2 bars starting at the bottom right of the arm hole place a removable marker on one of these sts to keep track of the row count continue working and decr as described in the video so you end up with 78 87 96 sts after round 2 continue knitting in
